channel.title: Comments on: Journey Through Traditional Cuisine

item.title: By: Byron Banks
item.dc:creator: Byron Banks
item.description: We discovered new taste combinations that were unknown to us before.
item.content:encoded: We discovered new taste combinations that were unknown to us before.

item.title: By: Lilian Sowerby
item.dc:creator: Lilian Sowerby
item.description: Dishes I tasted reminded me of my father, who was a fisherman and always cooked finger-licking meals for us. Everything was very tasty, sea buss particularly.
item.content:encoded: Dishes I tasted reminded me of my father, who was a fisherman and always cooked finger-licking meals for us. Everything was very tasty, sea buss particularly.
